name: cbvald
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))

|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w1))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

comment: Deduction used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution, particularly useful in conjunction with ~ dvelim . (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2002.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2016.) (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 13-May-2018.)
